testcase.classname: US1010 liste olarak verilen wrong user ile negatif login testi
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici "myUrl" anasayfaya gider....................................passed Then myCourse anasayfa login linkine tiklar.................................passed And myCourse kullanici adi olarak "myYanlisEmail" girer.....................passed And myCourse password olarak "myYanlisPassword" girer.......................passed And 1 sn bekler.............................................................passed Then myCourse login butonuna basar..........................................passed And 1 sn bekler.............................................................passed And myCourse giris yapilamadigini test eder.................................passed Then Sayfayi kapatir........................................................passed
